mapper.select: SELECT r.report_no , r.report_title , r.report_status , u.user_name , r.write_date , r.report_note FROM report r JOIN employee u ON u.user_NO = r.user_no

SELECT r.REPORT_NO , r.REPORT_TITLE , r.TRANS_START , r.TRANS_END , t.TEAM_NAME , u.USER_NAME , u.USER_NO , th.TRANS_DATE , th.PURPOSE_USE , th.TRANS_TYPE , th.DEPOSIT , th.WITHDRAWAL , th.BALANCE FROM REPORT r JOIN TRANS_HISTORY th ON r.REPORT_NO = th.REPORT_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE u ON r.USER_NO = u.USER_NO JOIN TEAM t ON u.TEAM_NO = t.TEAM_NO WHERE r.REPORT_NO = #{reportNo} ORDER BY th.TRANS_DATE ASC, CASE th.TRANS_TYPE WHEN '입금' THEN 0 WHEN '출금' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END
